did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: "Building a Union in the Hospitals: the Organization of Local 1199 at Montefoire Hospital, 1948-1958" Manuscript, 1948-1958
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: First part of a continuing study of the roots and impact of unionization in New York City's voluntary hospitals.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the first part of a continuing study of the roots and impact of unionization in New York City's voluntary hospitals., by Leon Fink and Brian Greenberg.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Medical personnel -- Labor unions -- United States.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: "Building a Union in the Hospitals: the Organization of Local 1199 at Montefoire Hospital, 1948-1958" Manuscript #5520m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
